entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Stratford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:14 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -3.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 6:48 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: -3.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -5.2°C
Wind: NW 34 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning early this evening. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 early this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill near minus 27. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
